snippet: Judges delayed their much-awaited decision and accused a crowd of Islamists of intimidating them, but what actually took place at the courthouse is a matter of dispute.
abstract: Egypt's constitutional court delays its much-awaited decision on legitimacy of Islamist-led legislative assembly that drafted new charter, accusing crowd of Islamists outside courthouse of intimidating them; what actually took place at courthouse is matter of dispute.
lead_paragraph: Judges delayed their much-awaited decision and accused a crowd of Islamists of intimidating them, but what actually took place at the courthouse is a matter of dispute.

headline.seo: Egyptian Court Postpones Ruling on Constitutional Assembly
headline.main: Egyptian Court Postpones Ruling on Constitutional Assembly
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Court Postpones Ruling on Legislative Body

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
